transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hanji sir, namaskar, Shweta baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Hanji madam, kaise ho?
Executive: Sir, mai thik hu, aap bataiye.
Customer: Bas thik hai, badhiya hai.
Executive: Hanji sir, aapka na mail receive hua tha mujhe.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Han, toh usi concern ke regarding discussion karne ke liye call kiya tha maine aapko.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Hanji sir, bataiye phir abhi tak ki problem kya aa rahi hai?
Customer: Problem toh aapko bata chuka hu kitni baar, koi nayi baat nahi hai, 6 mahine ho gaye, 6 mahine mein koi business hi nahi hai, matlab bakwas tarike ka ek mere ko de diya hai, matlab tab tak toh mai is condition mein tha ki chalo mujhe nahi pata hai, maine other apne friend circle mein baat kiya hai toh IndiaMART ko phir usi usi usme matlab isi segment mein achi khasi notification jaati hai un logo ko.
Mere ko shuru mein click kara diya ki aap click karo testing ke liye RO wala aur woh RO hi chal raha hai, RO ke alawa kuch aata hi nahi hai, matlab kya hai?
Matlab paise funkne ka koi matlab hi nahi reh gaya, isse toh koi matlab hi nahi hai, nonsense bilkul ho gaya hai yeh toh.
Agar IndiaMART ne yahi wale kaam karne hai toh phir toh koi matlab nahi hai na, ki marketing team kuch kehti hai, service team ke paas mein kuch aur condition hoti hai, toh apne liye toh koi solution hi nahi hai.
₹38,000 de diye, mere ko lag raha hai ki ₹38,000 mere paas faltu the, IndiaMART ne le liye, free ka maal tha.
Executive: Aapne kitne ka payment kiya hai? Kyuki hamare paas toh aapka jo PI hai woh ₹33,040 ka hai.
Customer: ₹38,000 payment hua hai GST ke saath mein.
Executive: Nahi, ₹33,040 including GST hai sir, isi mein GST included hai, jo mere paas aapka woh total PI dikha raha hai, ₹33,040, ₹28,000 plus GST hota hai na, toh ₹28,000 pe 18% GST, ₹5,040 ka woh total hoga.
Customer: Achha isme kya hai, kya hai yeh isme?
Ek minute.
Aapke yaha se.
Aap yeh hai na, isme already ₹33,040, chalo discounted price price hoga, thik hai, koi baat nahi, ₹33,040 sahi hai, ₹38,000 matlab koi matlab ka nahi hai na, meaningless ho gaya apne liye, ispe sir khapao, apna time waste karo woh alag hai.
Ek tarike se time wastage ho raha hai, ki ispe lagao aur dekho, notification hi tab aati hai jab lead khatam ho jaati hai.
Executive: Sir, dekho is cheez ke bare mein toh mai aapko pehle hi bata chuki hu, competition bahut hai. Madam, phir mere ko solution hi nahi mil raha na, mere ko toh koi matlab ka nahi hai, phir us cheez pe dekho us cheez pe aapke batane se toh mera solution nahi ho raha na, un cheezo ko sunne ke liye toh maine kam se kam nahi liya tha na.
Atleast maine yeh sab clarification dekho yeh clarification ke liye toh maine koi package nahi liya tha, ki kal ko jab koi baar service le lo toh is tarah ki clarification sunte raho.
Apna purpose yeh tha ki bhai chalo koi business milega ki ha apne liye ek tarike se apna marketing mein banda khud karte hai, marketing bande se karate hai, toh chalo apne ko ek helping support mil jayega, toh yeh toh helping hand nahi hai na.
Hmm.
Executive: Toh exactly main reason toh yahi aa raha hai ki aapke paas notification nahi aa pa rahi hai ya phir late aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ya toh ya toh notification aati nahi hai jo relevant equipments hai ya phir sirf RO ki bhari hui hai, RO ka mai pehle bhi bata chuka hu ki yeh ek KL, do KL mein RO mein deal hi nahi karta hu, woh domestic type ke hote hai, nahi deal karta hu mai.
Isme tamam mere agar dekha jaye catalog mein ginti toh maine bhi nahi matlab add karta gaya hu, ginti nahi gini hai maine bhi kitne product hai, par jo bhi product hai 20 ke aas pass toh product hai, 20 plus hai, lekin unme se RO ke alawa kuch aata hi nahi hai kya?
Matlab wohi mere jo trader hai jinse mai saman leta hu woh hue ya jo mere competitor hai unko jata hai lead, woh utha rahe hai achha khasa matlab business.
Aur apne liye bas wohi kahani hai ki yeh hai woh hai, toh koi matlab ka nahi hai na apne liye sab.
Executive: Toh yeh jo aapka concern hai na, overall concern, mai hamare ek quality department hota hai, thik hai, notification ke liye specially, mai unko dalti hu ki hamare paas notification nahi aa rahi hai, after marking I am interested, yeh sab aapne kar liya na jo maine aapko last time bataya tha?
Customer: Madam, mai kar raha hu, mai isiliye mail karna pada hai mere ko, mai jaise aapne bataya hai, mai past lead mein jata hu, past lead mein jaake I am interested, I am interested karta rehta hu, agar aapke yaha system pe show hota hoga toh aap bhi dekh sakte hai kitni baar kiya hai.
Ab baat yeh hai ki karte raho uspe time lagate raho aur koi response hi nahi aaye toh waise hi man nahi karta na, time wastage jaisi cheez lagti hai, ki time ka time waste ho raha hai aur paise ke paise bekar gaye.
Hmm. Aur ab tak toh mai soch raha tha ki mai yahi hu is segment ka ki sabse chhote plan ka hai, isliye yeh is tarike ki system chalta hai inka, lekin jab mujhe apne hi matlab circle mein pata chala un logo ko ki achha khasa business aa raha hai, unko aisa koi issue nahi hai.
Toh mere ko phir click hua hai ki aisa phir mere saath hi kyu ho raha hai?
Executive: Thik hai, toh dekho sabse jyada problem sirf notification ki aa rahi hai ki hamare paas timely notification nahi aa raha hai, ek toh yeh mujhe bataiye.
Customer: Jo product hai, sari wale product hai unka ha jo product hai unka notification time pe nahi aa raha jo other products hai aur jo notification ka criteria hai woh mostly RO water mein RO ke liye ho gaya 1000, 2000 LPH ke RO mein.
Executive: Thik hai. Baki membrane ya carbon ka aa raha hai, kuch ek membrane ya carbon ka hafte mein ek aad koi dikh jati hai aur baki ka toh kuch bhi nahi aa raha, kuch bhi nahi aa raha, itna sara water treatment mein ek product thodi hai.
Customer: Membrane ya carbon ka aa raha hai, kuch ek membrane ya carbon ka hafte mein ek aad koi dikh jati hai aur baki ka toh kuch bhi nahi aa raha, kuch bhi nahi aa raha, itna sara water treatment mein ek product thodi hai.
Kam se kam 100 ya product hai, maine toh utne laga bhi nahi rakhe, listed kar bhi nahi rakhe, par matlab unme se maine khud 20-25 jo bhi product listed kar rakhe hai, unme se kisi ka hi nahi hota, kabhi nahi hota, are mat do, ek din hafte mein kisi ek product ki mile, dusre din dusre ki mile, business ki baat toh mai chhod hi du, lead hi nahi hai yaha pe, kya faltu ki woh lead rehti hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir, mai iske liye feed dalti hu apni team ko, ha abhi mai aapko dobara phir se baat karti hu, iske regarding baat karti hu.
Customer: Woh matlab mere ko na iska solution chahiye, aise mere ko nahi matlab hai ki phir toh yeh ho gaya ki IndiaMART ke saath first and last ho jayega, mai over the life kabhi nahi use karunga IndiaMART chahe jo ho jaye phir, agar aisa hua toh mere saath mein, matlab business nahi mila mujhe, mai chhod dunga IndiaMART ko aur bhi bahut sare platform hai, jab karna hi aisa hai toh phir koi matlab hi nahi hai matlab, woh cheez ho jati hai ki paisa lagao barbad karo.
Executive: Mai aapki puri baat samajh rahi hu, mujhe aap thoda sa time do, mai solution ke saath hi aapko baat karti hu.
Thik hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai madam, thik hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- No business in the last 6 months.

- Only RO leads, no other product leads.

- Notifications come after lead is expired.

- Wasting time and money on IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to raise concern to quality department.

- Executive will call back with a solution.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back with a solution.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, notification, ro leads, product listing
